summary: Implements a Litellm integration for IBM watsonx.ai, offering a client that builds and sends requests for text completion and vector embeddings, translates OpenAI‑style parameters, handles authentication, supports synchronous and asynchronous streaming, and normalizes responses into unified model and usage structures.
business_intent: Allow developers to access watsonx.ai capabilities through a familiar OpenAI‑compatible interface, simplifying the incorporation of AI text generation and embedding services into applications.
